name: TwitterApiKit
shortDescription: Twitter's API v2 Objectified. This will save you time from creating data objects to access twitter's API v2. This library is supported on Gradle, Maven, Java, Kotlin, and Android projects.
longDescription: Twitter's API v2 Objectified. This will save you time from creating data objects to access twitter's API v2. This library is supported on Gradle, Maven, Java, Kotlin, and Android projects.
